snippet: José Mourinho of Real Madrid said he would be interested in coaching in the United States in the future, although not as the national coach.
abstract: Real Madrid soccer coach Jose Mourinho says he is interested in coaching in the United States in the future; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: José Mourinho of Real Madrid said he would be interested in coaching in the United States in the future, although not as the national coach.

headline.main: Real Madrid’s Mourinho Sees a Future Coaching in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid’s Mourinho Sees A Future Coaching in the U.S.
